q_ch: 我是Advanced Sewers，我尚未完成的任务有哪些，对应的顾客都是谁？
q_en: I am Advanced Sewers. What are the tasks I have not yet completed?
gt:
Hello there! 😄 It looks like you're part of the "Advanced Sewers" working group, and you're curious about the tasks you haven't completed yet. Let's take a look at the tasks assigned to your group:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Planned Number | Completed Number |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|----------------|------------------|
| 33      | 2024-07-17 00:00:00 | 2024-08-03 00:00:00 | 120            | 0                |

It seems like Task ID 33 is still pending completion. Keep up the great work, and you'll have it done in no time! 🚀 If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group named "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id, start_time, end_time, order_product_id, planned_number, completed_number, status FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '8' AND status != 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks that are not yet completed for the working group "Advanced Sewers"

response:
Hello there! 😄 It looks like you're part of the "Advanced Sewers" working group, and you're curious about the tasks that are still on your to-do list. Let's take a look at what needs your attention:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status       |
|---------|------------------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------------|
| 22      | 2024-04-09       | 2024-04-22       | 22               | 115            | 60               | In Progress  |
| 25      | 2024-05-14       | 2024-06-03       | 25               | 75             | 75               | In Progress  |
| 33      | 2024-07-17       | 2024-08-03       | 33               | 120            | 0                | Not Started  |

These tasks are either in progress or not yet started, so you might want to focus on them. Keep up the great work, and happy sewing! 🧵✨
